content: do the ribbing if you have an even number of stitches on each needle so that you always start with a knit stitch and end with a purl waum mitts v 3 © tracy hill 2018 2020 8 on the palm side needle i knit 2 together through the back loop to twist and tighten the stitches on the other two needles i use k2tog or ssk and usually place the decreases near the palm side where they will show less when worn k2tog through the back loop on the palm side for 16 stitches i generally reduce to 4 stitches on the palm side needle and 6 stitches each on the other two needles again whatever is most comfortable for you is okay you can also decrease on the first row of k1 p1 ribbing if you still need to reduce a few stitches after the first row once you have reached the required number of stitches complete the rest of the k1 p1 ribbing for the thumb length you want bind off and weave in the ends waum mitts v 3 © tracy hill 2018 2020 9
